title: Looking for Computer Program and League of Legends Enthusiast!
body:
Hello OCE,

Just posting a casual call out to any Computer Programmers who may be interested in working on a League of Legends project!
The project would be developing several of my idea, aiming at breaking down LOL strategy into simple decisions. 
The work will not be paid, and anything published from this is intended to be free (possible cut from donations, though the motivation for this should not be momentary).

- No experience required (although on the converse this could be used a great experience)
- Able to meet up in Sydney pref
- Strong passion for LOL and desire to improve the LOL community. 

The main criteria I will be basing this on is someone I believe shares my LOL passions, understands my vision and is someone I can generally get along with.  
If you're interested or have any questions please feel free to comment below or add me in game (Skyprus). 


Thanks for reading,
- Skyprus

replies.body: Good luck! I always enjoy seeing what you guys come up with :)
